A

alpha - Class in scoring
The Alpha class has the purpose of calculating and storing the information of a connection between 2 nodes.
alpha() - Constructor for class scoring.alpha
 

B

BayesClassifier - Class in classifier
The BayesClassifier class extends the Classifiers class Classifiers A BayesClassifier object has a strucutre of nodes (graph) that is used to elaborate a list of predictions.
BayesClassifier() - Constructor for class classifier.BayesClassifier
 
BNC - Class in main
The BNC class only contains the main of the project.
BNC() - Constructor for class main.BNC

Calculates the Confusions matrixes taking each possible value of the class as positive
calcN(ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in class scoring.alpha
Calculates every value of N_ijkc needed for the current edge along with the other Ns from the N_ijkc values
calcScore(alpha) - Method in class scoring.Edges
Method which will be overwritten by subclasses.
calcScore(alpha) - Method in class scoring.LL_edges
Uses LL criterion WeigthCalculator.calcScore(alpha)
calcScore(alpha) - Method in class scoring.MDL_edges
Uses MDL criterion WeigthCalculator.calcScore(alpha)
calcScore(alpha) - Method in interface scoring.WeigthCalculator
Method to calculate the weigth of a connection.
calcTeta(alpha[][], int, int) - Method in class classifier.connection
Method that caluclates teta values for all nodes exluding the root
calcTetaC(alpha) - Method in class classifier.NodeC
Method that calculates tetaC values for nodeC
calcTetaRoot(alpha[][], int, int) - Method in class classifier.connection
Method that caluclates teta values for the root node
checkVisited(boolean[]) - Method in class classifier.graph
Checks if all nodes are in the graph
classifier - package classifier
The package conatins the framework necessary for building a classifier out of the training data.
Classifiers - Class in classifier
The Classifiers class has the purpose of serving has a blueprint for a classifier.
Classifiers() - Constructor for class classifier.Classifiers
 
connection - Class in classifier
The connection class has the purpose of saving information about the connections in the graph.
connection(int, int) - Constructor for class classifier.connection
Connection's contructor which initializes parent and son's value
create(alpha[][]) - Method in class classifier.graph
Creates a graph using Prim's Algorithm

D

DAG - Variable in class classifier.graph
List of connections that represents the graph used by the classifier
data - package data
This package contains the one class InputHandler This class provides the functionality of reading, parsing and storing the values of the CSV file provided.
decideType(String) - Method in class data.InputHandler
Creates the rigth subclass of edges

E

Edges - Class in scoring
Edges is an abstract class which has the purpose of serving as blueprint for other classes.

evaluation - package evaluation

The graph class has the purpose of creating a graph to be used by the classifier.

I

InputHandler - Class in data
The InputHandler class has the purpose of parsing a CSV file that contains all the data needed for the classifier: the label names and the values for each label.

S

Scorer - Interface in evaluation
The interface Scorer contains the functions to evaluate the classifier performance.
scoring - package scoring
Provides the classes and interfaces necessary to create an adjacency matrix from the training data (equivalent to creating a fully connected graph).

Setter for DAG
setMatrix(int) - Method in class scoring.Edges
Creates an empty adjacency matrix

T

tree - Variable in class classifier.BayesClassifier
Graph used by the classifier {see @link classifier.graph}

U

updateVisited(int, boolean[]) - Method in class classifier.graph
Method called after a new node is inserted in the graph to update the list of the visited nodes

W

WeigthCalculator - Interface in scoring
An interface for the objects which take the training data and generate the fully connected graph

_

_class_node - Variable in class classifier.graph
Class node (C).
_labels - Variable in class data.InputHandler
ArrayList of the labels extracted from the first line of the CSV file Calculated through InputHandler.parseFile(String) Getter InputHandler.getLabels()
_N - Variable in class scoring.alpha
The number of instances calculated through alpha.calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
_N_C - Variable in class scoring.alpha
The number of instances regarding class possibilities calculated through alpha.calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
_N_J - Variable in class scoring.alpha
The number of instances regarding class and son node possibilities calculated through alpha.calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
_N_K - Variable in class scoring.alpha
The number of instances regarding class and parent node possibilities calculated through alpha.calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
_parent_node - Variable in class classifier.connection
Parent in connection
_son_node - Variable in class classifier.connection
Son in connection
_Source - Variable in class scoring.alpha
The number of every possibility of instance calculated through alpha.calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
_teta - Variable in class classifier.connection
Tetas related to each connection
_tetaC - Variable in class classifier.NodeC
The tetaC calculated through NodeC.calcTetaC(alpha)
_values - Variable in class data.InputHandler
ArrayList for each feature of the values extracted from the CSV file Calculated through InputHandler.parseFile(String) Getter InputHandler.getValues()
_weigth - Variable in class scoring.alpha
The weight of the edge calculated through Edges.calcScore(alpha)
